programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: When Alan dates a cookery teacher with a Martha Stewart complex, all her delicious feasts cause Charlie and him to pile on the pounds, and it is not long before she is running the house with an obsession for perfection. Comedy, starring Charlie Sheen and Jon Cryer

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Alan becomes convinced that Jake does not want to spend any time with him, so Charlie dates a psychiatrist in the hope that she might help Alan with his emotional insecurities. Starring Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer and Angus T Jones

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption (1994)
programme.desc: A banker is wrongly jailed for his wife's murder and over the course of a life sentence he forms a close friendship with a fellow inmate. He also earns a position of trust as book-keeper to the corrupt prison governor - but makes an enemy of his benefactor as he tries to clear his name. Frank Darabont's drama, starring Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler, Clancy Brown and Gil Bellows

programme.title: Ladette to Lady
programme.desc: The four remaining contestants are challenged to host a midsummer night's revel, but face the dangerous cocktail of alcohol and men when the bachelors stay overnight. After making their own nymph-like costumes and being rewarded for their hard work with a trip to the pub, the girls present a magical evening. However, Rosemary Shrager makes an unpleasant discovery the next morning, which leaves a dark cloud hanging over Hereford Hall. Narrated by Ben Gooder

programme.title: You've Been Framed!
programme.desc: More humorous clips narrated by Harry Hill, including an out-of-control rally car, a trampoline with very little bounce, and a showdown between a cat and a dog, plus another selection of painful-looking accidents and calamities caught on camera

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie finds it difficult to deal with a relationship that is not based on sex, so when he proposes something inappropriate to Mia, their chaste relationship takes a turn for the worse. Starring Charlie Sheen and Emmanuelle Vaugier

programme.title: Two and a Half Men
programme.desc: Charlie is desperate to consummate his relationship with Mia, so he arranges a romantic date. However, his oversexed former girlfriend causes trouble. Starring Charlie Sheen and Emmanuelle Vaugier

programme.title: Benidorm
programme.desc: Madge comes to terms with bad news from her doctor and makes the most of her last few days in the sun, while Mick braces himself to tell the family about her diagnosis. Kenneth decides to go on a health kick, hiring Liam as his personal trainer, and the Solana guests take part in an eating competition, organised by Cyril in his new role as assistant manager. He's keen to ensure they use the cheapest food available, and the resulting hog roast leads to the contestants taking on more than they bargained for

programme.title: The Magaluf Weekender
programme.desc: A trio of lads from Manchester and three Newport girls check into the Lively Hotel, and rep Jordan is thrilled to finally welcome some Welsh guests to Magaluf. Meanwhile, as the boys try to cheer Ellis up and help him move on from an ex-girlfriend, a season's worth of tension comes to a head for the rep team. Last in the series

programme.title: Housesitter (1991)
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: The Blackheath Poisonings
programme.desc: Part two of three. Investigations into Roger's death cause members of the family to act strangely - and another suspicious death upsets the situation further. Christine Kavanagh, Zoe Wanamaker and Julia St John star

programme.title: The Young Ones (1961)
programme.desc: A clean-cut teenager tries to save his youth club from a greedy tycoon who wants to demolish it and build an office block by recording a hit pop single. Musical, starring Cliff Richard, Robert Morley, Melvyn Hayes, Richard O'Sullivan and Carole Gray and the rest of the Shadows. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: There's much excitement in Aidensfield as Lord Ashfordly returns home with his new wife, and the villagers are pleasantly surprised to discover how glamorous and charming she is. However, a series of violent hijackings leaves the newlyweds shaken and in need of protection from Mike - but the intrepid officer's suspicions are aroused by the blushing bride's odd behaviour

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike joins forces with Scotland Yard when a gang of thieves turns up in Aidensfield, apparently plotting to steal a valuable horse from local trainer Kieron Doyle. The heroic copper doggedly pursues his quarry to the detriment of his relationship with Tricia - but tragedy strikes, leaving him heartbroken

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are hired to cure a patchy lawn at a select language school hiding dark secrets. The disappearance of a Polish student alerts them to a tale of passion, rivalry and revenge, and when a handyman is found with his throat cut they race to find the killer. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The mysterious death of a former police commissioner forces a reluctant Morse to team up with old professional rival Chief Inspector Dawson. As they and Sergeant Lewis begin to investigate, a link is uncovered to the unsolved case of a girl murdered 18 years previously. John Thaw stars, with Kevin Whately, Kenneth Colley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The sleuthing spinster teams up with a dashing man to investigate a series of poison-pen letters in the sleepy village of Lymstock. Two of the missives have led to suicides - but Miss Marple suspects there is more to the deaths than meets the eye. Murder mystery with an all-star cast, featuring Geraldine McEwan, James D'Arcy, Emilia Fox, Imogen Stubbs and Ken Russell

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis investigate the death of a maintenance engineer found shot in the head in the basement of the Bodleian Library. A search of the man's house reveals a stash of valuable volumes and a connection to the local Gamblers Anonymous group, and the detectives go on to expose a scam involving two Oxford academics. Drama, guest starring Neil Pearson and Haydn Gwynne, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A young woman asks Poirot to investigate her father's murder - a 14-year-old crime for which her mother was found guilty and executed. The detective agrees to investigate, but warns his client that he may discover things she does not want to hear. David Suchet stars, with Rachael Stirling, Aidan Gillen, Aimee Mullens, Toby Stephens, Gemma Jones, Patrick Malahide and Annette Badland

programme.title: The Best of the Royal Variety
programme.desc: A look at the speciality acts that have appeared over the years, including ventriloquists, acrobats, magicians and performance artists. With contributions by Keith Harris, the Krankies, Bernie Clifton, the Caesar Twins and the Umbilical Brothers

programme.title: Steptoe and Son Ride Again (1973)
programme.desc: Rag-and-bone man Harold invests his father Albert's life savings in buying a racing greyhound. However, the dog is in no fit state to compete, and after a disastrous debut, the hapless pair end up heavily in debt. Wily Harold soon has another plan to get the money they need - involving faking Albert's death. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Harry H Corbett , Wilfrid Brambell and Diana Dors. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part one of two. Fitz helps the police probe a youngster's disappearance, drawing up character profiles of those closest to him and suggesting how inquiries should be conducted. Unfortunately, his investigation provokes a frenzy of violence, ending in tragedy and forcing him to confront his own tortured personal life. Robbie Coltrane stars, with Barbara Flynn and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: The Wings of the Dove (1997)
programme.desc: An impoverished but calculating Edwardian Englishwoman is desperate for money and status, so she comes up with a scheme to make a fortune by marrying off her lover to a dying heiress. Romantic period drama adapted from the novel by Henry James, starring Helena Bonham Carter, Linus Roache, Michael Gambon and Elizabeth McGovern. Including FYI Daily

programme.desc: Part one of two. Meanwhile, Sergeant Craddock finds his efforts to prepare for an important visit hampered by a series of attacks on the station, and Vernon makes a startling discovery in his bathtub. Jason Durr and Clare Calbraith star

programme.desc: An FBI agent crosses swords with Poirot while trying to retrieve the American Navy's top-secret plans for a new submarine, which have been stolen by a glamorous nightclub singer with a sideline in espionage. Drama, starring David Suchet

programme.desc: The Belgian sleuth is called in to investigate the kidnapping of the prime minister and his secretary. However, because of the international situation, he has only a day and a half to solve the case. Drama, starring David Suchet

Comedy, guest starring Tony Selby, with Keith Barron, Gwen Taylor, Joanna Van Gyseghem and Neil Stacy

programme.desc: A well-known eccentric contacts the Belgian sleuth when he is haunted by suicidal nightmares. However, he fails to follow Poirot's advice, and is found dead soon afterwards. Drama, starring David Suchet, with Joely Richardson and Mary Tamm

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The story of Carole Davies, who 50 years ago met her father, brother and sister for the first and last time and has been searching for them ever since. Also featured is Samantha Grygolowicz, a mixed-race woman who grew up in a white family and has not seen her Jamaican father since she was five. Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present

programme.title: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Remake of the 1970s drama based on the novel by Andrea Newman. The lives of Peter and Cassie Manson are turned upside down when their daughter Prue reveals she is pregnant by her teacher Gavin Sorenson. As well as Peter's aching fear that he has lost his daughter for ever, he is rocked by the unnerving certainty that Gavin is on a personal mission against him. Starring Trevor Eve, Hermione Norris, Imogen Poots and Tom Riley

programme.title: The Vice

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Aidensfield residents are shocked when an MI5 agent turns up in the village showing more than just a passing interest in the activities of Vernon Scripps and his mysterious associate, a man who disembarked from a Russian trawler docked in Whitby harbour. It seems there is an even darker side to the roguish wheeler-dealer than they suspected

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Goodwin and Makori work through the night to save a toddler diagnosed with meningitis, while a dying mother worries that her alcoholic husband will not be able to care for their children after she is gone. Meanwhile, Nkeshi's future may be decided by a job offer in Cameroon

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A Belgian film star arrives in London and summons her friend Poirot to unravel the mysterious threats she has been receiving, which demand the return of a priceless diamond, the Western Star. Rosalind Bennett guest stars

programme.title: French Fields
programme.desc: William is headhunted by a French accountancy firm, and he and Hester decide to move to France. However, the pair soon discover that what divides the British and French is more than just the English Channel. Sequel to Fresh Fields, starring Julia McKenzie and Anton Rodgers

programme.desc: The hotel waiter is unhappy when the new management's sweeping changes disrupt the lives of holidaymakers and staff, so socialist-minded Amy lends support to his cause

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A photographer is murdered shortly after exhibiting a compromising picture of Barnaby - who becomes a suspect in the ensuing investigation. Joyce concludes that someone is trying to frame him, and is stunned when he admits to a previous relationship with the murdered man's wife. Jones is forced to work with the irritating Martin Spellman to solve the case. Guest starring Liza Goddard, Adrian Scarborough and Richard Lintern

programme.title: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Peter's already volatile obsession with Gavin takes a dangerous turn when Prue returns from her honeymoon battered and bruised. Cassie tries to hold the family together, but begins to fall under her son-in-law's spell, intrigued by his knowledge of Peter's past and the mysterious Paula. Remake of the 1970s drama, starring Trevor Eve, Tom Riley, Imogen Poots and Hermione Norris

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: The team encounter human trafficking when they investigate a club owner suspected of dealing drugs, but while Adam Parkes seems most likely to crack the case, it's family man Stuart Cole who delivers the vital witness. Hard-hitting drama, starring David Harewood and Jake Nightingale

programme.title: Brides in the Bath
programme.desc: Martin Kemp stars in this one-off fact-based drama set in pre-First World War Yorkshire, telling the story of George Joseph Smith, who used his considerable charm to woo and marry three women at the same time. Unluckily for the ladies in his life, the cad's crimes did not stop at bigamy. All three women had a certain degree of wealth - and all three were doomed to be drowned in their baths by their husband. Co-starring Richard Griffiths and Bad Girls' Tracey Wilkinson, with Emma Ferguson, Jennifer Calvert and Susan Brown

Nostalgic drama, starring Jason Durr, Rupert Vansittart and Geoffrey Hughes

Hospital drama, starring Kananu Kirimi and Robert Cavanah

programme.desc: William and Hester tell daughter Emma about their decision to move to France, and set about finding somewhere suitable to live. Comedy, starring Julia McKenzie and Anton Rodgers

programme.title: Duty Free
programme.desc: The hotel throws a fancy dress occasion and guests are invited to provide the entertainment. The Pearces and the Cochrans perform their party pieces. Eighties sitcom about two couples who meet on a Spanish package holiday, with Keith Barron, Gwen Taylor, Neil Stacy, Joanna Van Gyseghem

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Eagle-eyed George sees an investment opportunity when Mildred suggests their dog should have puppies. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Lord Ashfordly's staff come under suspicion when some African carvings are stolen from the hall - but then an African chieftain arrives claiming the very same pieces belong to his tribe. Vernon sees a business opportunity that needs the royal stamp of approval and probationary PC Tom Nicholson turns up at the station. Nostalgic drama, starring Jason Durr, Rupert Vansittart and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: A Native American arrives in Jessica's beloved Cabot Cove, claiming the whole town and its surrounding area belongs to him, and clutching a land grant to prove it. When a local industrialist is found murdered soon after, all signs point to the newcomer being the culprit. Drama, starring Angela Lansbury and Tom Bosley

programme.title: Doc Hollywood (1991)
programme.desc: An arrogant doctor on his way to California causes an accident in a rural South Carolina town and is sentenced to community service at the local hospital. Initially desperate to leave, he gradually comes to appreciate a slower pace of life. Comedy, starring Michael J Fox, Julie Warner, Woody Harrelson, Bridget Fonda and George Hamilton. Including FYI Daily

programme.title: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Gavin's personal quest for the truth nears its conclusion, forcing Peter to face a dark secret from his past that sheds a disturbing light on his love for Prue. As the net begins to close, the Mansons are forced to acknowledge a truth that could destroy their lives for ever. Remake of the 1970s drama, starring Tom Riley, Trevor Eve, Imogen Poots and Hermione Norris. Last in the series

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: Ambitious Chief Inspector Frank Vickers realises rookie cop Lorraine Johnstone's relationship with a pimp could do irreparable damage to the team's reputation and credibility if it becomes widely known. Determined to protect himself at all costs, he attempts to sacrifice her while there's still time, making Inspector Joe Robinson realise the full extent of his corruption. Gritty drama, starring David Harewood, Philip Glenister, Tamzin Malleson and Tim Pigott-Smith. Last in the series

programme.title: A Touch of Frost
programme.desc: First of a two-part episode of the popular crime drama, in which the disappearance of an ambitious surgeon keeps Frost and new partner DS Reid busy, especially when it transpires quite a few people have cause to want her out of the way. On the personal front, a mysterious woman arrives on Frost's doorstep with some startling news regarding his past. Starring David Jason, Bruce Alexander, Robert Glenister and Arkie Whiteley

programme.title: Housesitter (1991)
programme.desc: An architect has a fling with a kooky waitress, who takes it upon herself to move into his house and pass herself off as his wife. When the woman he is actually in love with says she thinks the marriage is good for him, he decides to play along with the deception. Romantic comedy, starring Steve Martin, Goldie Hawn, Dana Delany, Donald Moffat and Julie Harris

programme.title: The Blackheath Poisonings
programme.desc: Part two of three. Investigations into Roger's death cause members of the family to act strangely - and another suspicious death upsets the situation further. Christine Kavanagh, Zoe Wanamaker and Julia St John star

programme.title: The Young Ones (1961)
programme.desc: A clean-cut teenager tries to save his youth club from a greedy tycoon who wants to demolish it and build an office block by recording a hit pop single. Musical, starring Cliff Richard, Robert Morley, Melvyn Hayes, Richard O'Sullivan and Carole Gray and the rest of the Shadows

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: There's much excitement in Aidensfield as Lord Ashfordly returns home with his new wife, and the villagers are pleasantly surprised to discover how glamorous and charming she is. However, a series of violent hijackings leaves the newlyweds shaken and in need of protection from Mike - but the intrepid officer's suspicions are aroused by the blushing bride's odd behaviour

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Mike joins forces with Scotland Yard when a gang of thieves turns up in Aidensfield, apparently plotting to steal a valuable horse from local trainer Kieron Doyle. The heroic copper doggedly pursues his quarry to the detriment of his relationship with Tricia - but tragedy strikes, leaving him heartbroken

programme.title: Rosemary & Thyme
programme.desc: The duo are hired to cure a patchy lawn at a select language school hiding dark secrets. The disappearance of a Polish student alerts them to a tale of passion, rivalry and revenge, and when a handyman is found with his throat cut they race to find the killer. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

programme.title: Inspector Morse
programme.desc: The mysterious death of a former police commissioner forces a reluctant Morse to team up with old professional rival Chief Inspector Dawson. As they and Sergeant Lewis begin to investigate, a link is uncovered to the unsolved case of a girl murdered 18 years previously. John Thaw stars, with Kevin Whately, Kenneth Colley and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Marple
programme.desc: The sleuthing spinster teams up with a dashing man to investigate a series of poison-pen letters in the sleepy village of Lymstock. Two of the missives have led to suicides - but Miss Marple suspects there is more to the deaths than meets the eye. Murder mystery with an all-star cast, featuring Geraldine McEwan, James D'Arcy, Emilia Fox, Imogen Stubbs and Ken Russell

programme.title: Lewis
programme.desc: Hathaway and Lewis investigate the death of a maintenance engineer found shot in the head in the basement of the Bodleian Library. A search of the man's house reveals a stash of valuable volumes and a connection to the local Gamblers Anonymous group, and the detectives go on to expose a scam involving two Oxford academics. Drama, guest starring Neil Pearson and Haydn Gwynne, with Kevin Whately and Laurence Fox

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A young woman asks Poirot to investigate her father's murder - a 14-year-old crime for which her mother was found guilty and executed. The detective agrees to investigate, but warns his client that he may discover things she does not want to hear. David Suchet stars, with Rachael Stirling, Aidan Gillen, Aimee Mullens, Toby Stephens, Gemma Jones, Patrick Malahide and Annette Badland

programme.title: The Best of the Royal Variety
programme.desc: A look at the speciality acts that have appeared over the years, including ventriloquists, acrobats, magicians and performance artists. With contributions by Keith Harris, the Krankies, Bernie Clifton, the Caesar Twins and the Umbilical Brothers

programme.title: Steptoe and Son Ride Again (1973)
programme.desc: Rag-and-bone man Harold invests his father Albert's life savings in buying a racing greyhound. However, the dog is in no fit state to compete, and after a disastrous debut, the hapless pair end up heavily in debt. Wily Harold soon has another plan to get the money they need - involving faking Albert's death. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Harry H Corbett , Wilfrid Brambell and Diana Dors

programme.title: Cracker
programme.desc: Part one of two. Fitz helps the police probe a youngster's disappearance, drawing up character profiles of those closest to him and suggesting how inquiries should be conducted. Unfortunately, his investigation provokes a frenzy of violence, ending in tragedy and forcing him to confront his own tortured personal life. Robbie Coltrane stars, with Barbara Flynn and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: The Wings of the Dove (1997)
programme.desc: An impoverished but calculating Edwardian Englishwoman is desperate for money and status, so she comes up with a scheme to make a fortune by marrying off her lover to a dying heiress. Romantic period drama adapted from the novel by Henry James, starring Helena Bonham Carter, Linus Roache, Michael Gambon and Elizabeth McGovern

programme.title: Fresh Fields

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mike faces a stressful time as he struggles to cope with his wife's departure, and Tricia offers him a shoulder to cry on, but is beset by problems of her own after prescribing birth control to a 16-year-old. Meanwhile, Sergeant Craddock finds his efforts to prepare for an important visit hampered by a series of attacks on the station, and Vernon makes a startling discovery in his bathtub. Jason Durr and Clare Calbraith star

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: After finding out about the hospital's staffing problems, Jill offers to cut short her maternity leave and return to work, while Matron notices that Catherine is doing her best to avoid Adam. Out in Africa, Jeff faces the horrors of war and makes a promise to a dying woman - but faces difficulties in keeping his word

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: An FBI agent crosses swords with Poirot while trying to retrieve the American Navy's top-secret plans for a new submarine, which have been stolen by a glamorous nightclub singer with a sideline in espionage. Drama, starring David Suchet

programme.desc: The prime minister asks Holmes to investigate the disappearance of a letter which could lead to a major European catastrophe. programme.title: The Royal

The presence of an unhappy celebrity causes a paparazzi furore, and nearly costs Frankie his job. Dr Weatherill deals with an uncooperative alcoholic on her first day back at work. Medical drama, starring Paul Fox

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: The Belgian sleuth is called in to investigate the kidnapping of the prime minister and his secretary. However, because of the international situation, he has only a day and a half to solve the case. Drama, starring David Suchet

programme.title: Fresh Fields
programme.desc: The couple return from a second honeymoon in Italy, but there is trouble ahead when lingerie is found in William's cas. Meanwhile, Guy and Nancy make a big announcment. Comedy, starring Anton Rodgers and Julia McKenzie. Last in the series

programme.title: Duty Free
programme.desc: David picks up the wrong bag at the airport, only to find it contains bundles of bank notes. He gives it to Linda to hide and when Robert finds it, he assumes David and Linda are planning to elope. Later, two sinister men arrive to retrieve the item - at any cost. Comedy, guest starring Tony Selby, with Keith Barron, Gwen Taylor, Joanna Van Gyseghem and Neil Stacy

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: Henpecked George resigns from his job as a traffic warden and has to break the news to his wife. Brian Murphy and Yootha Joyce star

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: While promoting her new book, Jessica learns the storyline has been used by a Hollywood producer without her permission. Doug McClure guest stars

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A well-known eccentric contacts the Belgian sleuth when he is haunted by suicidal nightmares. However, he fails to follow Poirot's advice, and is found dead soon afterwards. Drama, starring David Suchet, with Joely Richardson and Mary Tamm

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: The story of Carole Davies, who 50 years ago met her father, brother and sister for the first and last time and has been searching for them ever since. Also featured is Samantha Grygolowicz, a mixed-race woman who grew up in a white family and has not seen her Jamaican father since she was five. Davina McCall and Nicky Campbell present

programme.title: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Remake of the 1970s drama based on the novel by Andrea Newman. The lives of Peter and Cassie Manson are turned upside down when their daughter Prue reveals she is pregnant by her teacher Gavin Sorenson. As well as Peter's aching fear that he has lost his daughter for ever, he is rocked by the unnerving certainty that Gavin is on a personal mission against him. Starring Trevor Eve, Hermione Norris, Imogen Poots and Tom Riley

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: At Vickers' suggestion, feisty PC Kirsty Morgan is given one last chance to prove herself with the Special Crime Group as the team begin the search for the killer of a prostitute. Joe is less than pleased to have her back, and staggered when she tries her seductive charms on him in a bid to find a niche for herself in the unit. Drama, starring David Harewood and Rosie Marcel

programme.title: Heartbeat
programme.desc: Aidensfield residents are shocked when an MI5 agent turns up in the village showing more than just a passing interest in the activities of Vernon Scripps and his mysterious associate, a man who disembarked from a Russian trawler docked in Whitby harbour. It seems there is an even darker side to the roguish wheeler-dealer than they suspected

programme.title: The Royal
programme.desc: Goodwin and Makori work through the night to save a toddler diagnosed with meningitis, while a dying mother worries that her alcoholic husband will not be able to care for their children after she is gone. Meanwhile, Nkeshi's future may be decided by a job offer in Cameroon

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Poirot
programme.desc: A Belgian film star arrives in London and summons her friend Poirot to unravel the mysterious threats she has been receiving, which demand the return of a priceless diamond, the Western Star. Rosalind Bennett guest stars

programme.title: French Fields
programme.desc: William is headhunted by a French accountancy firm, and he and Hester decide to move to France. However, the pair soon discover that what divides the British and French is more than just the English Channel. Sequel to Fresh Fields, starring Julia McKenzie and Anton Rodgers

programme.title: Duty Free
programme.desc: The hotel waiter is unhappy when the new management's sweeping changes disrupt the lives of holidaymakers and staff, so socialist-minded Amy lends support to his cause

programme.title: George and Mildred
programme.desc: The Ropers babysit for their neighbours, but George misses his usual routine - so he nips out to a darts match with the infant in tow. Comedy, starring Brian Murphy

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A photographer is murdered shortly after exhibiting a compromising picture of Barnaby - who becomes a suspect in the ensuing investigation. Joyce concludes that someone is trying to frame him, and is stunned when he admits to a previous relationship with the murdered man's wife. Jones is forced to work with the irritating Martin Spellman to solve the case. Guest starring Liza Goddard, Adrian Scarborough and Richard Lintern

programme.title: Bouquet of Barbed Wire
programme.desc: Peter's already volatile obsession with Gavin takes a dangerous turn when Prue returns from her honeymoon battered and bruised. Cassie tries to hold the family together, but begins to fall under her son-in-law's spell, intrigued by his knowledge of Peter's past and the mysterious Paula. Remake of the 1970s drama, starring Trevor Eve, Tom Riley, Imogen Poots and Hermione Norris

programme.title: The Vice
programme.desc: The team encounter human trafficking when they investigate a club owner suspected of dealing drugs, but while Adam Parkes seems most likely to crack the case, it's family man Stuart Cole who delivers the vital witness. Hard-hitting drama, starring David Harewood and Jake Nightingale

programme.title: Brides in the Bath
programme.desc: Martin Kemp stars in this one-off fact-based drama set in pre-First World War Yorkshire, telling the story of George Joseph Smith, who used his considerable charm to woo and marry three women at the same time. Unluckily for the ladies in his life, the cad's crimes did not stop at bigamy. All three women had a certain degree of wealth - and all three were doomed to be drowned in their baths by their husband. Co-starring Richard Griffiths and Bad Girls' Tracey Wilkinson, with Emma Ferguson, Jennifer Calvert and Susan Brown

programme.desc: Home shopping

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Cliff is surprised to receive an offer he cannot refuse - especially since it comes from a woman he reported to the mail authorities. John Ratzenberger stars

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam sells his Corvette and suffers the humiliating consequences, while inexperienced boss Norm commiserates when he too is humbled by the new crew he hires to help out his booming business. Ted Danson and George Wendt star

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Lilith gives birth to the Cranes' first child, as the rest of the regulars celebrate the bar's 100th anniversary. Comedy, starring Bebe Neuwirth

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Carla receives a phone call telling her that her husband Eddie has been killed in a freak accident. At his funeral, she makes a chilling discovery. American comedy, starring Rhea Perlman

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The Cranes cringe over their son's impending circumcision in the traditional Jewish ceremony, and Frailer attempts to rescue him. Meanwhile, Rebecca organises a corporate retirement party for her boss's brother-in-law

programme.desc: Part two of two. Henry Cole checks out the runners and riders on this year's British Superbike grid, continues restoring his old Honda and joins Chris Walker on a pizza-delivery mission

programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews. Including FYI Daily

programme.desc: Brandon gets the chance to prove his worth when Darrell lets him take responsibility for their latest purchase in Chino, California

programme.desc: Liz McClarnon heads to Preston, where she hears the story of a 15-year-old whose mother is concerned about the way she dresses. programme.title: Surf's Up (2007)
programme.desc: Animated comedy in a documentary style. A penguin longs to follow in the footsteps of his hero, legendary surfer Big Z, and leaves his Antarctic home to compete in a prestigious tournament on a tropical island. Unfortunately the waves in this warmer climate are much bigger than anything he has experienced - and the egotistical reigning champion does not take kindly to competition. With the voices of Jeff Bridges and Shia LaBeouf

programme.title: Baby Boom (1987)
programme.desc: A successful New York consultant is made the guardian of her dead cousin's baby daughter. At first she plans to put the child up for adoption, but finds herself unable to go through with it and reluctantly takes on the role of mother - a decision that throws her personal and professional lives into turmoil. Comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Harold Ramis, Sam Shepard and Sam Wanamaker

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: The talent show's auditions continue as aspiring performers hope to impress four-time Grammy-winning country star Keith Urban, singer and actress Jennifer Lopez, musician and songwriter Harry Connick Jr and record producer Randy Jackson, who takes on the role of mentor this year. Presented by Ryan Seacrest

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Scott and Dave use GPS technology to track a pair of mobile-phone thieves, and a car crashes into a house during the Christmas period. Plus, Nick pursues a criminal gang, Vicky deals with a van containing suspicious-looking scrap, and Jason contends with his own traffic nightmare

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Jon puts his body on the line as he tackles a drunken youth in a domestic dispute and Martin turns detective to catch a drink-driver who thinks she can get one over on the interceptors. Elsewhere, a speeding motorist causes chaos after crashing into a gas main, Doug gets to grips with a burglar and the hunt is on for Lincoln's answer to Harry Houdini. Documentary following the work of Lincolnshire's Roads Policing Unit

programme.title: Snowtrapped
programme.desc: From avalanches to in-car burials, this documentary tells seven stories of people who became trapped by snow. Real-life footage brings to life how some survived against both the odds and the elements, how some were found despite having no means of communicating with the outside world, and how others were not so lucky. Including film from the helmet camera of skier Kristoffer Carlsson, who was buried alive under two metres of snow in Verbier, Switzerland, after triggering an avalanche

programme.title: On Benefits & Proud
programme.desc: Documentary examining the lifestyles of some of those living on benefits who are not currently seeking employment, including a Gloucestershire mother-of-11 who receives benefits equivalent to three times the typical UK family income. Also featured are a Liverpool couple who have not worked for six years, and two single mums in Camden whose rents are more than Â£1,200 a month each and are paid by the state

programme.title: The Big Benefits Row
programme.desc: A panel discusses the UK's welfare system and why the subject has become such a political hot potato, with questions and contributions by a studio audience. Topics covered include whether the process is being abused and if it should be made harder for the long-term unemployed and recent immigrants to claim benefits

programme.title: Fat for Cash
programme.desc: Documentary about three American women making money by tapping into the market for men who prefer the larger form. Jen from Boston weighs 30st and is deliberately piling on the pounds to bring in the dollars, selling movies in which she lowers herself onto men's chests as they lay on her specially reinforced bed. Former supersize model Sammee has launched a pole-dancing club night in Las Vegas called Thick Sundaes, while 40st Christina is starting her own subscription website

programme.desc: An outwardly bored suburban couple lead double lives as professional assassins, with both unaware of their partner's secret. When they are hired to kill each other, the deadly situation puts some much-needed excitement back into their stale relationship. Comedy adventure, starring Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Vince Vaughn and Adam Brody

programme.title: Police 5
programme.desc: Joe Crowley and Kate Macintyre offer advice on crime prevention, using hidden camera stunts to reveal the tricks of the thieves' trade, and also accompanying police on raids and talking to amateur detectives and have-a-go heroes who fought back in the name of justice. Shaw Taylor - who presented the original Police 5 series that ran in some ITV regions from 1962 to 1992 - returns to the screen to try to reunite theft victims with what is rightfully theirs, and there are appeals for information on the nation's most wanted criminals

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The CBI tries to solve the murder of a Santa Claus impersonator, and Jane is questioned by an independent investigator in connection with the death of cop-killer Todd Johnson, who was set on fire while in police custody. Drama, starring Simon Baker, Robin Tunney, Owain Yeoman and Amanda Righetti

programme.title: Played
programme.desc: A high-end litigator at a downtown law office goes missing, and his colleague believes that the firm's partners, specialists in corporate crime, are involved. Moreland cosies up to the managing partner Christopher Locke, and engages the whistle-blower in a dangerous sting operation to find the truth

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The agents investigate the Halloween murder of a marine with a fondness for playing practical jokes. As the evidence accumulates, they begin to suspect he was killed by the exasperated victim of one of his pranks. Drama, starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: Cedar Cove
programme.desc: New series. Drama following the fortunes of Olivia Lockhart, a small-town judge, both inside and away from the courtroom. As the tale gets under way, Olivia considers a career move that could cost her a new romance, and force her to leave behind the home she has come to love

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The team finds a corpse that appears to have been eaten by a large snake. When the serpent later shows up dead, the autopsy reveals drugs were being transported inside its body - and the trail leads to an old enemy of Horatio's who previously escaped justice owing to diplomatic immunity. Meanwhile, Wolfe is asked to investigate a theft, but stumbles on a case of identity fraud

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A jet carrying a fortune in bank funds crashes into a residential area, killing everyone on board. Horatio investigates, and begins to suspect sabotage - a theory reinforced by the discovery that one of the passengers was already dead when the tragedy occurred. Guest starring Michael Landes

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A billionaire playboy and his date are shot by a bowman during a party celebrating a local artist, leaving the girl dead, the host in shock - and detectives unsure which of the pair was the target. Meanwhile, a music promoter is found murdered with posters promoting his new band glued to his body - and flyers for a rival group on a nearby wall. Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes star

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The body of 19-year-old Ethan Grohl is discovered on the Brooklyn Bridge and the detectives find an envelope in his backpack containing photographs of a young woman who appears to be dead. Further inquiries lead the team to San Francisco, with Jo inviting her old flame FBI Agent Cade Conover along to help. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise and Sela Ward

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Nick and Catherine investigate the case of a man beaten and sexually assaulted in an alleyway. Meanwhile, Langston and the team respond to a fatal shooting at an electronics store, only to discover the victim is the rapist being sought by their colleagues. To complicate matters, three people step forward to confess to his murder

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A man is garrotted beside a hotel pool surrounded by dozens of other sun-worshippers, yet none of them witnesses the attack because the killer struck during a solar eclipse, when all eyes were trained on the sky. Even more baffling, the first DNA evidence suggests a human-wolf mutation was present at the time of the attack

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and the team are sent to investigate the case of two people killed at an oil company whose executives are martial arts experts. Meanwhile, Dr Hawkes and Detective Flack look into the suspicious death of a teenage boy who spent most of his time on his computer. Drama, starring Gary Sinise, Eddie Cahill and Hill Harper

programme.title: Under the Dome
programme.desc: Riots break out when rationing is brought in after the town's only water tower is damaged in an accident and Lake East Point is found to be polluted with methane, leading the townsfolk to loot the store and fight one another for the remaining resources. Meanwhile, Julia and Dodee try to track down the source of a high-pitched sound they believe is connected to the dome

programme.title: Sons of Anarchy
programme.desc: The bad blood between the Sons and the Niners seems to be well and truly in the past as Pope makes an intriguing proposal to Jax, and August leads the gang to the home of the prison warden responsible for Opie's demise. Meanwhile, Roosevelt recovers from the beating he received during the burglary, but his wife's injuries prove to be much more serious. Crime drama, starring Charlie Hunnam

programme.title: Jane Doe
programme.desc: The former government agent is called back into action after kidnappers abduct a district attorney's wife during plastic surgery - meaning nobody knows what the victim now looks like. The criminals demand the release of the defendant in a money-laundering trial, but the accused denies all knowledge of the crime. Thriller, starring Lea Thompson, Joe Penny and Jessy Schram

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The team is called in when the corpses of six fishermen are found tied together in the ocean - with one missing a chunk of flesh from his leg. Initial findings point to modern-day pirates and possible cannibalism and the rescue of two survivors from the same boat soon gives weight to this theory - but then Horatio discovers the ship was involved in the transport of illegal arms

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and Stella investigate the murder of the host of a high-stakes poker game, while Danny and Hawkes conduct inquiries into the mysterious death of a news channel's weather girl whose body has been found in Central Park - and discover an incriminating videotape at her office that could provide clues. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: The disappearance of a federal judge's daughter on the same day as her grandmother dies leads the team to the family's guarded home, where security officers insist the girl never left the property. Convinced she was murdered, Jane searches for the body and concludes the victim was placed in her relative's coffin - prompting him to test his theory on the day of the funeral. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A baseball star becomes the prime suspect in the murder of his limousine driver, who had been regularly supplying him with steroids. Briscoe and Green's investigation reveals blackmail as the underlying motive for the crime. Jerry Orbach and Jesse L Martin star

programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio investigates the deaths of two tax inspectors who were killed on the same day - one shot in his car and the other gunned down by the owner of a yacht that he was trying to repossess. Meanwhile, Ryan causes friction by taking credit for work that Delko did in the field. Willie Garson (Sex and the City) and Zac Efron (High School Musical) guest star

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac and Stella investigate a new fantasy game sweeping New York, and discover that harmless role-playing has begun to overlap with reality in deadly fashion. Meanwhile, a woman's death is traced to an exotic cuisine event where the dishes include live centipedes, Brazilian cockroaches, fried tarantulas and other dubious delicacies

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The bodies of two dishonourably discharged officers are found on board a boat belonging to Gibbs, and inquiries cast suspicion on his mentor, retired agent Mike Franks. The case proves to have wider implications - and the team finds itself battling to prevent an international confrontation. Starring Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Cote de Pablo, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A serial killer begins posting footage of his crimes online - and as the agents investigate, they realise that each film contains visual clues to the identity of the next victim. In a further bizarre twist, Abby later finds what seems to be a new video on her computer - and the case takes on fresh urgency with the discovery that it is actually a live feed, suggesting the murderer is somewhere on the premises

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kidnappers strike on Halloween, wounding a marine sergeant and snatching his daughter - leaving the team members wondering why anyone would try to extort money from someone on such a modest salary. As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Miami detective Horatio Caine enlists Mac's help as he pursues serial killer Henry Darius in New York. However, he soon loses the trail and is forced to follow other leads. An investigation into the sister of one of Darius's victims proves a dead end, but the team soon finds a vital link between the murderer and one of his hostages. David Caruso guest stars

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: Blade rushes to Berlin to save a pregnant woman whose unborn child harbours a dark secret, and is being pursued by Chase. Meanwhile, Marcus reveals the secret of Aurora to Krista

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Archer uses Woodhouse as a decoy while attempting to rescue the Pope from an assassination plot. Comedy animation about a group of highly trained spies

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Part one of two. Malory receives information that a B-52 bomber carrying a hydrogen bomb has crashed in the Atlantic ocean, and plans to return it to American authorities for a sizeable reward. Meanwhile, Cheryl's brother Cecil leads the team on the expedition to the Bermuda Triangle, but his motives prove to be far from altruistic

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: The agents kidnap rock star Tyler Martin to discover who is plotting his murder, after a supposed autograph hunter visits the musician at Buy More armed with a grenade. When the would-be-killer turns up at a concert, Tyler and Chuck are forced to stage-dive to safety. Guest starring Dominic Monaghan (Lost)

programme.title: Meltdown
programme.desc: An experiment to destroy an asteroid goes wrong and shifts the Earth closer to the sun, plunging a city into a relentless heatwave. The population is driven into a frenzied outbreak of crime, which a dedicated police officer battles to control while also keeping his own family safe. Thriller, starring Casper Van Dien and Venus Terzo

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A burglar falls from a third-floor balcony and lands on a passer-by, killing him in the process, and when the injured thief is tracked down, he is found to have footage of a judge in a compromising position. While Horatio tries to prove the robbery was arranged to prevent a blackmail attempt, Ryan and Tyler search for the woman on the recording - and find she may have met with foul play

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Mac, Danny and Lindsay investigate the death of a doll-shop owner found buried beneath his dismantled stock. Meanwhile, Stella and Dr Hawkes learn a waitress has been killed in a new flat given to her by a customer. Detective drama, with Gary Sinise

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane and the team investigate a death threat, but find themselves in danger when a building explodes. Meanwhile, Lisbon confronts billionaire Walter Mashburn again when they meet during a case. Crime drama, starring Simon Baker and Robin Tunney

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The charred body of an Asian girl is found outside the apartment of the Chinese consul general. Forensics discover she was murdered before her corpse was burned, prompting detectives to investigate rumours that the diplomat is somehow connected. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Horatio investigates the murder of a woman working for a dating agency, and although suspicion initially falls on an angry client, DNA testing reveals the killer was female. Valera later finds evidence that could solve the case - but unfortunately it would also violate the privacy of a rape victim. Elsewhere, Delko loses his badge and sets out to find it before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman's body is found in the water tank of a building in which six suspicious deaths have occurred over a 10-year period, making Lindsay wonder if the place is cursed. Meanwhile, Stella and Hawkes discover a man's corpse on a playground swing

programme.title: Longmire
programme.desc: The sheriff investigates when a man is killed by a wild bear, while Branch has to deal with his gun-toting uncle causing trouble at the retirement home. Peter Weller guest stars

programme.title: Dirty Harry (1971)
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson

programme.title: Terminator
programme.desc: Sarah, John and Cameron locate another name on their list, leading them to book a series of appointments with a psychologist. Derek is tracked down by a resistance fighter from the future and Catherine Weaver's daughter makes a worrying claim. Drama, starring Lena Headey

programme.title: Alphas
programme.desc: Rosen and Bill analyse the machine that was used to enhance Jason Miller's ability and take it to inventor Skylar Adams, but they are hindered by a man named Gower, who wishes Rosen dead for the revelation that broke up his family. Rachel receives heightened abilities when the device flashes light in her face, which she uses to determine where Zoe is being held hostage

programme.title: My Name Is Earl
programme.desc: A guilty Earl returns the hot-dog cart he and his friend Ralph stole when they were younger. However, the good deed does not quite go to plan and he has to enlist the help of Randy, Joy, Catalina and Darnell in an effort to cross the theft off his list

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Sarah and Chuck go undercover as a happily married couple in suburbia, with the latter being forced to become particularly well acquainted with one neighbour, whose husband is suspected of being a Fulcrum agent. Andy Richter and Jenny McCarthy guest star

programme.title: Summer House (2008)
programme.desc: A woman moves into her husband's family home after the death of her father-in-law, dismissing rumours that the property is cursed. However, when her spouse is involved in a near-fatal accident, she determines to uncover the truth behind the mystery. Thriller, starring Lindsay Price, David Jones, Sadie LeBlanc, Niall Matter and Emma Stevens

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A woman is killed in a carjacking incident, but Horatio becomes convinced the seemingly random crime is actually a premeditated murder. Digging into the victim's personal life and her husband's business affairs, he unearths several well-concealed secrets. Meanwhile, Alexx discovers Dr Monroe is drinking heavily - and declares her intention to turn him in. Holly Valance guest stars

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A roller derby star is killed during a game, but it is unclear which side the culprit belongs to. Meanwhile, an author is found dead with the final chapter of his novel scrawled all over his body, leading the detectives to conclude he may have suffered from a compulsive urge to write. Crime drama, starring Gary Sinise

programme.title: The Mentalist
programme.desc: Jane is kidnapped, but as Lisbon and the team go back over his previous cases in search of clues to the abductor's identity, they realise he had numerous enemies, any one of whom might be responsible. Crime drama, starring Robin Tunney and Simon Baker

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A high school student is killed by a hit-and-run driver, with tyre marks at the scene indicating it was deliberate. The case is complicated when the chief suspect is murdered and his mother brought in by the detectives for questioning. Jerry Orbach and Sam Waterston star

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: An American football star is murdered at a school reunion, and it soon turns out there were plenty of jealous former classmates who would have been more than happy to see the back of him. Forensic crime drama, starring David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A corpse is discovered in a natural history museum, but the CSI detectives are unable to make an immediate identification because a swarm of flesh-eating beetles has partially devoured it. A six-year-old is later found hiding in the building, and proves to be a key witness. Meanwhile, Flack is called to a building site where a man has been poisoned with insulating foam

programme.title: Person of Interest
programme.desc: The Machine selects the social security number of Graham Wyler, the seemingly respectable owner of a hardware shop who lives in the suburbs with his wife and daughter. Reese moves in next door and discovers Wyler is a safe-cracker wanted for a string of robberies that took place in the 1990s - and his former criminal associates need his skills for one last job

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Kidnappers strike on Halloween, wounding a marine sergeant and snatching his daughter - leaving the team members wondering why anyone would try to extort money from someone on such a modest salary. As the agents begin searching for a motive, Abby surprises everyone by turning up at the lab in a revealing fancy-dress costume

programme.title: Until Death (2007)
programme.desc: A heroin-addicted New Orleans detective is shot in the head by a drug lord and lapses into a coma. On regaining consciousness he discovers the man responsible for putting him in hospital has kidnapped his pregnant wife, and sets out to rescue her and exact a fitting revenge on her abductor. Action thriller, with Jean-Claude Van Damme, Selina Giles, Mark Dymond and William Ash

programme.title: Nightline
programme.desc: An incisive late-night news series that analyzes the day's top stories with interviews and reports. It occasionally features program-length documentaries, weeklong series and town-hall forums. The program began in November 1979 as 'The Iran Crisis: America Held Hostage', with Frank Reynolds anchoring. Ted Koppel took over shortly thereafter and it expanded its scope (and took the name 'Nightline') on March 24, 1980. Koppel served as anchor until 2005, when he was replaced by a troika of hosts

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia

programme.title: Let's Make a Deal
programme.desc: An update of the classic game show in which contestants wearing outrageous costumes make deals with the host to win money and prizes

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: 'Come on down!' Contestants guess retail values for prizes on TV's longest-running game show. Bob Barker racked up over a dozen hosting Emmys since CBS first aired the daytime staple in 1972, though it originated with Bill Cullen on NBC (1956-63) and ABC (1963-65). However, it was the genial, ageless Barker who really sold viewers on the show, which spawned several syndicated offshoots and a string of prime-time specials. When Barker retired in 2007, Drew Carey stepped in to ably fill his shoes

programme.title: Life Today
programme.desc: A series featuring biblical teachings and reports on Christian relief efforts

programme.title: The Young and the Restless
programme.desc: An iconic, enduring soap opera, this is the steamer set in Genoa City, where the Newman and Abbott dynasties stir it up in the bedroom and the boardroom. Best known for long-term love triangles, issue-oriented plots, a multi-ethnic cast and slick production values, `Y&R' has been showered with Emmys, launched countless careers and spawned the equally lavish `The Bold and the Beautiful.' Former cast members include Tom Selleck and David Hasselhoff

programme.title: The Queen Latifah Show
programme.desc: Queen Latifah interviews popular celebrities and entertainers, as well as helping charitable causes using the show as a platform

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show
programme.desc: Emmy-winning, upbeat talk-and-variety show featuring celebrity interviews and music performances, tinged with the appealing DeGeneres's off-the-wall observational humor (plus her own rather unusual style of dancing). There's also a refreshing sense of viewer participation, as she often reads fan letters on air, calls people just to chat and recognizes acts of kindness that were brought to her attention

"If you can dream it, you can do it," she says. "It's like being released into the wild to have fun."

programme.title: Castle

programme.desc: Jane sets out to connect Maura with her biological mother. Meanwhile, Angela gets swept up in a political campaign; and a nun from the Rizzoli family's past returns

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An FBI agent (Marcia Gay Harden) is raped while working undercover, and she asks Benson to have her rape kit tested. She then quickly resumes her work to preserve her cover, and only reluctantly allows detectives to become involved in the case, which on the surface involves a protest of a mosque at Ground Zero but really is much bigger

programme.title: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
programme.desc: Closing-night coverage of the 138th annual Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show. Featured: the sporting, working and terrier group competitions; Best in Show. From New York's Madison Square Garden

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: David Brenner appears as himself when Jay takes Gloria to see a comedy show for Valentine's Day. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire decide to spice up their romantic holiday; and Mitchell and Cameron try to set Manny up on a date

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Phil and Claire assume their alter egos, Clive and Juliana, for another Valentine's Day rendezvous. Meanwhile, Jay's surprise for Gloria encounters one obstacle after another; and Cameron and Mitchell dispute an admirer's intentions

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A rookie cop helps detectives catch a flasher suspected of rape. However, ADA Marlowe is uncertain they have the right man in custody, and soon it becomes clear that the rookie has been hiding something

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: In the 11th-season finale, an 8-year-old boy with feuding parents is kidnapped. The case eventually puts detectives in a dangerous standoff and leads ADA Marlowe to make some surprising revelations about her personal history

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The violent behavior of two former Army reservists is linked to an antimalaria drug, and Novak locks horns with the Defense Department. Trainer: John Dossett. Hemphill: Jon Bernthal. Anthony: William Ullrich. Callahan: R.E. Rodgers. Col. Gage: Julian Gamble

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After Benson talks a pregnant woman (Estella Warren) off a ledge, it's discovered that she's the daughter of a scam artist and a controversial scientist (Lynda Carter, Ronny Cox). Pallister: Julian Sands. Zierko: Peter Riegert. Cleo Conrad: Jill Marie Lawrence. Benson: Mariska Hargitay

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: After a woman (Katherine Moennig) fights off an attacker, what seems to be a case of self-defense murder grows more complicated following a blood test. Eddie: Chad Lindberg. Morty Berger: Michael Lerner. Lisette: Lindsay Kraft. Cabot: Stephanie March. Benson: Mariska Hargitay. Stabler: Christopher Meloni

programme.title: Olympics 2014
programme.desc: The U.S. meets China in women's curling, with veteran Erika Brown's squad facing a returning Chinese foursome that captured bronze in its Olympic debut in 2010

programme.title: Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show
programme.desc: Closing-night coverage of the 138th annual Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show. Featured: the sporting, working and terrier group competitions; Best in Show. From New York's Madison Square Garden

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Two seamen (Chris Heuisler, Donnie Jeffcoat) stumble upon the body of a female Navy lieutenant, and, in the absence of an ID, Gibbs' team races to find her identity. Cdr. Reynolds: Kent Faulcon. PO Cynthia Cluxton: Amy Sloan

programme.title: Olympics 2014
programme.desc: The puck drops in men's hockey with Czech Republic vs. Sweden at the Bolshoy Ice Dome. Forwards Jaromir Jagr and Nicklas Backstrom spearhead talented nations that have taken gold in three of the five previous Olympics

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The accidental death of a civilian at a military demolition site leads to the discovery of more bodies and the conclusion that the area could be the dumping ground of a serial killer. Vic Gera: Michael Guarnera. Cpl. Stinson: Laird Macintosh. Agent Fornell: Joe Spano

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy aviator (Mary Page Keller) is nearly killed when her car explodes, and the FBI, suspecting terrorism, takes over, asking Gibbs' team to protect the woman and her family. David Shields: Sean O'Bryan. Jennifer Shields: Amanda Fuller. Willy: David Henrie

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Charles Durning guest stars as a World War II Medal of Honor recipient who turns himself in to Gibbs, claiming that he murdered his best friend on Iwo Jima nearly 60 years ago. Faith Coleman: Alicia Coppola. Superintendent: Hugh Holub. Tony: Michael Weatherly

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs' team is summoned when a Navy commander who had a successful open-heart operation bursts into flames while recovering. Cdr. Janice Byers: Stacy Edwards. Paula Cassidy: Jessica Steen. McGee: Sean Murray

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The decomposing body of a sailor is found in an abandoned restaurant, and the agents work with local law-enforcement officers on the case. One of the detectives is a lot like Tony, personally and professionally, and their bond prompts Tony to open up about his relationship with Jeanne, with whom, it's very clear, he's falling in love

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Navy recruiter is killed at a college fair, and the team is helped by Ducky's predecessor, Dr. Walter Magnus (Bob Newhart)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A marine is beaten to death in his backyard, and the team tries to find the man's family and the murder weapon to solve the crime

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A naval commander's death is investigated while the agents also undergo psychological evaluations

programme.title: Psych
programme.desc: Shawn and Gus investigate the drowning of a teenager in a quirky small town after receiving a mysterious email invitation to a local festival. The case takes an odd turn when they discover that the victim had been declared dead years earlier. "Twin Peaks" cast members Sherilyn Fenn, Sheryl Lee and Dana Ashbrook guest star in this tribute to the cult-favorite series
